column4: where do I go to get help with a word processor that I can't open?
where can I find someone to help me open a *.doc file?
you can open .doc with openoffice writer, abiword, koffice
It tells me that the file is a binary file
then maybe is a windows virus
My son, who got it from a friend, can open it with MS Office
But I have Windows 7 on another computer, and notepad can open it
of course, there are photos in the word processor document
I do have a lot of things that seem java
For frostwire, I am missing sun-java6-jre
but I can't find it, even in Synaptic
then just install it: sudo apt-get install sun-java6-jre
I have checked main, universe, restricted, and multiverse
